name: Tiny-Tims Broken House Adventure
description:
Tiny-Tims Broken House Adventure

A game jam-game by CaptainCat and dreeq

----

CONTROLS:

Z: confirm

X: skip

Arrow keys: movement 

INSTRUCTIONS:

1. Talk to both your neighbors, the conversations will determine how they will help you rebuild your house.

2. When you have talked to both your neighbors, go back to your house and activate it with Z to see your new DREAM HOUSE(tm)!

----

STORY

One night a storm sets fire to Tiny-Tims dream house. He must rebuild his home with some help from his neighbors.

Play the game several times to see the different versions of the house.
